titleStmt.title: Cicero's three books touching the nature of the gods done into English, with notes and illustrations.
titleStmt.author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.

notesStmt.note: First edition in English of the author's De natura deorum--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Errata on p. [2] after the preface.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
